title: Battlerite

notes:
Dx11 mode doesn't render textures properly. Works fine in directx 9 mode. Played 300+ hours under linux via wine
You can pass the launch option '-force-d3d9' to make it persistent
Regions appear ???, but it impacts nothing. Just select the region you are in
